util/

hiihat_split_data.pro


top source hiihat_split_data

util

hiihat_split_data, labels, num_folds [, domains=intarr(n)] [, /verbose], train_idx=intarr(ntr), test_idx=intarr(nte)

Utility function for splitting labeled data across multiple folds for cross-validation. If multiple domains are specified, points are sampled sequentially across each domain and indices are returned in order of the domains.

Parameters

labels in required type=intarr(n)

labels for each of the data points

num_folds in required type=fix

number of folds for data splitting

Keywords

domains in optional type=intarr(n)

domains for each of the data points

verbose in optional type=boolean

print verbose output to console

train_idx out required type=intarr(ntr)

output training indices

test_idx out required type=intarr(nte)

output testing indices

Author information
